name: Panda Pinball
description: Panda Pinball is a small project done for class at the University of Central Florida. The player's goal is to use the panda ball to collect bamboo to open the gate to the next level. Each level has a different layout and grants more points. The third and final level has Super Bamboo which once activated after collecting all the bamboo in the third level will grant a large amount of points to the player and then deactivate allowing the player to reactivate to get more points. The player's goal is to gather as many points as they can and get the high score.
